create table BIT_XOR (a int);
select 2 as expected, /*!01000/**/*/ 2 as result;
select 1 as expected, /*!99998/**/*/ 1 as result;
select 7 as expected, /*!01000 1 + /* 8 + */ 2 + */ 4 as result;
select 7 as expected, /*!01000 1 + /*!99998 8 + */ 2 + */ 4 as result;
select 4 as expected, /*!99998 1 + /*!99998 8 + */ 2 + */ 4 as result;
select 4 as expected, /*!99998 1 + /*!01000 8 + */ 2 + */ 4 as result;

select 4 as expected, /* 1 + /*!01000 8 + */ 2 + */ 4;
WITH cte AS (SELECT 0 /*! ) */ SELECT * FROM cte a, cte b;
WITH cte AS /*! ( */ SELECT 0) SELECT * FROM cte a, cte b;
SELECT cast( NULL AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS DATETIME );
create aggregate my_avg(int4) (stype = avg_state, sfunc = avg_transfn, finalfunc = avg_finalfn)
create table agg_data_2k as select g from generate_series(0, 1999) g;
ALTER AGGREGATE alt_agg3(int) OWNER TO regress_alter_generic_user2;
ALTER CONVERSION alt_conv1 RENAME TO alt_conv2;
CREATE FOREIGN DATA WRAPPER alt_fdw1
CREATE SERVER alt_fserv1 FOREIGN DATA WRAPPER alt_fdw1;
ALTER FOREIGN DATA WRAPPER alt_fdw1 RENAME TO alt_fdw2;
CREATE OPERATOR @-@ ( leftarg = int4, rightarg = int4, procedure = int4mi )
ALTER OPERATOR @+@(int4, int4) OWNER TO regress_alter_generic_user2
CREATE STATISTICS alt_stat1 ON a, b FROM alt_regress_1
ALTER STATISTICS alt_stat1 RENAME TO alt_stat2
CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY alt_ts_dict1 (template=simple);
ALTER TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY alt_ts_dict1 RENAME TO alt_ts_dict2
CREATE TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE alt_ts_temp1 (lexize=dsimple_lexize)
ALTER TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE alt_ts_temp1 RENAME TO alt_ts_temp2
CREATE TEXT SEARCH PARSER alt_ts_prs1 (start = prsd_start, gettoken = prsd_nexttoken, end = prsd_end, lextypes = prsd_lextype)
ALTER TEXT SEARCH PARSER alt_ts_prs1 RENAME TO alt_ts_prs2
DROP FOREIGN DATA WRAPPER alt_fdw2 CASCADE
DROP OPERATOR === (boolean, boolean)
COMMENT ON TABLE attmp_wrong IS 'table comment';
ALTER VIEW attmp_view_new RENAME TO fail
create table nv_parent (d date, check (false) no inherit not valid)
drop rule def_view_test_ins on def_view_test
create table attest1 as select * from atacc1
create temp table old_oids as select relname, oid as oldoid, relfilenode as oldfilenode from pg_class where relname like 'at_partitioned%'

select relname,c.oid = oldoid as orig_oid,case relfilenode when 0 then 'none' when c.oid then 'own' when oldfilenode then 'orig' else 'OTHER' end as storage, obj_description(c.oid, 'pg_class') as desc from pg_class c left join old_oids using (relname) where relname like 'at_partitioned%' order by relname
select conname, obj_description(oid, 'pg_constraint') as desc from pg_constraint where conname like 'at_partitioned%' order by conname

select relname,c.oid = oldoid as orig_oid,case relfilenode when 0 then 'none' when c.oid then 'own' when oldfilenode then 'orig' else 'OTHER' end as storage, obj_description(c.oid, 'pg_class') as desc from pg_class c left join old_oids using (relname) where relname like 'at_partitioned%' order by relname
drop type lockmodes
alter table alterlock set (toast.autovacuum_enabled = off)
alter view my_locks set (autovacuum_enabled = false)
create publication pub1 for table alter1.t1, all tables in schema alter2
